Priority Recommendations: Enhance service level agreements with specific metrics

Term & Renewal.Specific Provisions Analysis: Termination notice of 60 days is longer than preferred; no month-to-month renewal.

Payment & Financial Terms.Specific Provisions Analysis: Payment terms are net-16, which is below the standard net-30; late fees are 5%, which is higher than the standard.
Payment & Financial Terms.Deviation from Best Practices: Late fee structure and payment terms are not aligned with industry standards.
Payment & Financial Terms.Improvement Opportunities: Change payment terms to net-30 and adjust late fee to 1.5%.

Service Level Agreements.Specific Provisions Analysis: Service level definitions are vague; credit mechanisms are limited.
Service Level Agreements.Deviation from Best Practices: Lack of specific service availability guarantees.
Service Level Agreements.Improvement Opportunities: Define clear service levels and credit caps.

Risk Allocation.Specific Provisions Analysis: Limitation of liability is present but lacks specific caps; exclusion of consequential damages is included.
Risk Allocation.Improvement Opportunities: Introduce a cap on liability based on charges.

Operational Terms.Specific Provisions Analysis: Installation and maintenance processes are mentioned but lack detail.
Operational Terms.Deviation from Best Practices: Change management procedures are not defined.

Security & Compliance.Specific Provisions Analysis: Confidentiality and data protection provisions are included.
Security & Compliance.Deviation from Best Practices: Regulatory compliance obligations are not explicitly stated.

Contract Administration.Specific Provisions Analysis: Amendment procedures are defined but assignment rights are limited.
Contract Administration.Deviation from Best Practices: Assignment rights should be more flexible.
Contract Administration.Improvement Opportunities: Allow for more flexible assignment rights.

Mitigation Recommendations: Align payment terms with industry standards

Strategic Considerations: Evaluate potential risks in service delivery
Implementation Priorities: Negotiate key terms before finalizing the agreement
